short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for saving and managing highlihted text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for saving highlights (selected text) that you find interesting during your reading session. Each highlight is saved with timestamp and link to the site from which has been saved. You can export your highlights to JSON file.
